title: I Was Exhausted Both Mentally and Physically, but a Beautiful Woman Appeared in Front of Me, and We Decided To Live Together - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Abandoned Children   Beautiful Female Lead   Debts   Male Protagonist   Past Trauma
author: Asuka   あすか
description:
Would you like to live with a beautiful woman? Of course, there's that one too ......

One day, after working several part-time jobs to pay off his father's debts, Akira finally runs out of energy and collapses on the side of the road. It's Akira who was helped by Eri, a beautiful older sister who happened to pass by. However, the beautiful older sister has one habit and two habits ... and cohabitation has begun ...?>
